speaker: SIR HUGH EVANS
text_entry: SCENE II. A street.

speaker: SIR HUGH EVANS
text_entry: Enter MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Nay, keep your way, little gallant; you were wont to

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: be a follower, but now you are a leader. Whether

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: had you rather lead mine eyes, or eye your master's heels?

speaker: ROBIN
text_entry: I had rather, forsooth, go before you like a man

speaker: ROBIN
text_entry: than follow him like a dwarf.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: O, you are a flattering boy: now I see you'll be a courtier.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Enter FORD

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Well met, Mistress Page. Whither go you?

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Truly, sir, to see your wife. Is she at home?

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Ay; and as idle as she may hang together, for want

speaker: FORD
text_entry: of company. I think, if your husbands were dead,

speaker: FORD
text_entry: you two would marry.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Be sure of that,--two other husbands.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Where had you this pretty weather-cock?

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: I cannot tell what the dickens his name is my

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: husband had him of. What do you call your knight's

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: name, sirrah?

speaker: ROBIN
text_entry: Sir John Falstaff.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Sir John Falstaff!

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: He, he; I can never hit on's name. There is such a

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: league between my good man and he! Is your wife at

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: home indeed?

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Indeed she is.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: By your leave, sir: I am sick till I see her.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Has Page any brains? hath he any eyes? hath he any

speaker: FORD
text_entry: thinking? Sure, they sleep; he hath no use of them.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Why, this boy will carry a letter twenty mile, as

speaker: FORD
text_entry: easy as a cannon will shoot point-blank twelve

speaker: FORD
text_entry: score. He pieces out his wife's inclination; he

speaker: FORD
text_entry: gives her folly motion and advantage: and now she's

speaker: FORD
text_entry: going to my wife, and Falstaff's boy with her. A

speaker: FORD
text_entry: man may hear this shower sing in the wind. And

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Falstaff's boy with her! Good plots, they are laid;

speaker: FORD
text_entry: and our revolted wives share damnation together.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Well; I will take him, then torture my wife, pluck

speaker: FORD
text_entry: the borrowed veil of modesty from the so seeming

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Mistress Page, divulge Page himself for a secure and

speaker: FORD
text_entry: wilful Actaeon; and to these violent proceedings all

speaker: FORD
text_entry: my neighbours shall cry aim.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Clock heard

speaker: FORD
text_entry: The clock gives me my cue, and my assurance bids me

speaker: FORD
text_entry: search: there I shall find Falstaff: I shall be

speaker: FORD
text_entry: rather praised for this than mocked; for it is as

speaker: FORD
text_entry: positive as the earth is firm that Falstaff is

speaker: FORD
text_entry: there: I will go.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER, Host, SIR HUGH EVANS, DOCTOR CAIUS, and RUGBY

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: Well met, Master Ford.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Trust me, a good knot: I have good cheer at home;

speaker: FORD
text_entry: and I pray you all go with me.

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: I must excuse myself, Master Ford.

speaker: SLENDER
text_entry: And so must I, sir: we have appointed to dine with

speaker: SLENDER
text_entry: Mistress Anne, and I would not break with her for

speaker: SLENDER
text_entry: more money than I'll speak of.

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: We have lingered about a match between Anne Page and

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: my cousin Slender, and this day we shall have our answer.

speaker: SLENDER
text_entry: I hope I have your good will, father Page.

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: You have, Master Slender; I stand wholly for you:

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: but my wife, master doctor, is for you altogether.

speaker: DOCTOR CAIUS
text_entry: Ay, be-gar; and de maid is love-a me: my nursh-a

speaker: DOCTOR CAIUS
text_entry: Quickly tell me so mush.

speaker: Host
text_entry: What say you to young Master Fenton? he capers, he

speaker: Host
text_entry: dances, he has eyes of youth, he writes verses, he

speaker: Host
text_entry: speaks holiday, he smells April and May: he will

speaker: Host
text_entry: carry't, he will carry't; 'tis in his buttons; he

speaker: Host
text_entry: will carry't.

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: Not by my consent, I promise you. The gentleman is

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: of no having: he kept company with the wild prince

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: and Poins; he is of too high a region; he knows too

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: much. No, he shall not knit a knot in his fortunes

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: with the finger of my substance: if he take her,

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: let him take her simply; the wealth I have waits on

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: my consent, and my consent goes not that way.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: I beseech you heartily, some of you go home with me

speaker: FORD
text_entry: to dinner: besides your cheer, you shall have

speaker: FORD
text_entry: sport; I will show you a monster. Master doctor,

speaker: FORD
text_entry: you shall go; so shall you, Master Page; and you, Sir Hugh.

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: Well, fare you well: we shall have the freer wooing

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: at Master Page's.

speaker: SHALLOW
text_entry: Exeunt SHALLOW, and SLENDER

speaker: DOCTOR CAIUS
text_entry: Go home, John Rugby; I come anon.

speaker: DOCTOR CAIUS
text_entry: Exit RUGBY

speaker: Host
text_entry: Farewell, my hearts: I will to my honest knight

speaker: Host
text_entry: Falstaff, and drink canary with him.

speaker: Host
text_entry: Exit

speaker: FORD
text_entry: [Aside]  I think I shall drink in pipe wine first

speaker: FORD
text_entry: with him; I'll make him dance. Will you go, gentles?

speaker: All
text_entry: Have with you to see this monster.

speaker: All
text_entry: Exeunt
